item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (East): The Rainforest Trek | TREKKING & WILDLIFE TOUR
item.description: A walk in India’s easternmost wildlife park This trekking holiday takes you to the Namdapha National Park located in eastern Arunachal Pradesh.

item.title: Assam: Parks of the Brahmaputra Valley | WILDLIFE TOUR
item.description: Jewels of the east Brahmaputra valley of Assam, is the geographical heart of northeastern India.
